text: Moderato Wisintainer, also Visintainer, in line-ups generally Moderato, (14 July 1902 in Alegrete (RS) – 31 January 1986 in Pelotas (RS)) is a former Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. ==Honours== ===Club=== * Campeonato Carioca (2): :Flamengo: 1925, 1927 ==International goals== Brazil's goal tally first # Date Venue Opponent Score Result Competition 1\. 20 July 1930 Estadio Centenario, Montevideo, Uruguay 1–0 4–0 1930 FIFA World Cup 2\. 20 July 1930 Estadio Centenario, Montevideo, Uruguay 3–0 4–0 1930 FIFA World Cup Category:1902 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Footballers from Rio Grande do Sul Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
title: Moderato (footballer)
